review: CHECK YOUR INTERNET SPEED BEFORE YOU BUY THIS! It does not work on our TVs!  We have the slowest Internet speeds in the country! Will not work til we upgrade our services! There is no faster service available in our area at this time. I wish that Amazon would tell you that your speed must be 3.5 MBPS minimum for the Fire TV Stick to work. We have 1.0 or less! We also have Amazon Prime and the movies do NOT work for us either. Not Amazon's fault but I feel they should mention this in the ad or promo!
